biolockj.module.seq

Class PreRarefier

  • java.lang.Object
    • biolockj.module.BioModuleImpl
      • biolockj.module.ScriptModuleImpl
        • biolockj.module.JavaModuleImpl
          • biolockj.module.seq.PreRarefier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BioModule, JavaModule, ScriptModule

    public class PreRarefier
extends JavaModuleImpl
implements JavaModule
    This BioModule imposes a minimum and/or maximum number of reads per sample. Samples below the minimum are discarded. Samples above the maximum are limited by selecting random reads up to the maximum value.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static String INPUT_RAREFYING_MAX
      Config property "preRarefier.max" defines the maximum number of reads per file
      protected static String INPUT_RAREFYING_MIN
      Config property "preRarefier.min" defines the minimum number of reads per file
      static String NUM_RAREFIED_READS
      Metadata column name for column that holds number of rarefied reads per sample: "Num_Rarefied_Reads"

      void runModule()
      For each file with number reads outside of Config.INPUT_RAREFYING_MIN and Config.INPUT_RAREFYING_MAX values, generate a new sequence file from a shuffled list of its sequences.

      • checkDependencies

        public void checkDependencies()
                       throws Exception
        Validate module dependencies
        1. Validate Config.INPUT_RAREFYING_MIN is a non-negative integer
        2. Validate Config.INPUT_RAREFYING_MAX is a positive integer that is greater than or equal to Config.INPUT_RAREFYING_MIN (if defined)
        Specified by:
        checkDependencies in interface BioModule
        Overrides:
        checkDependencies in class ScriptModuleImpl
        Throws:
        Exception - thrown if missing or invalid dependencies are found

      • getPreRequisiteModules

        public List<Class<?>> getPreRequisiteModules()
                                      throws Exception
        This method always requires the prerequisite module: RegisterNumReads. If paired reads found, also return a 2nd module: PearMergeReads.

      • runModule

        public void runModule()
               throws Exception
        For each file with number reads outside of Config.INPUT_RAREFYING_MIN and Config.INPUT_RAREFYING_MAX values, generate a new sequence file from a shuffled list of its sequences.
        Specified by:
        runModule in interface JavaModule
        Specified by:
        runModule in class JavaModuleImpl
        Throws:

      • rarefy

        protected void rarefy(File seqFile)
               throws Exception
        Builds the rarefied file if too many seqs found, or adds files with too few samples to the list of bad samples.
